title: ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ To Reportedly Cast Four Transgender Roles
description:
The upcoming Disney Plus series Daredevil: Born Again was recently retooled to better fit in with both the original Netflix series and the Marvel Cinematic Universe. As such, production is still ongoing for the show, and one report claims Daredevil: Born Again is allegedly casting four transgender roles. Many familiar faces are set to return [...]

title: Divisive Horror Movie Climbs Into The Netflix Top 10
description:
Subscribers of Netflix have been watching a rather divisive horror movie, sending it straight into the Top 10 category of the massive streaming platform. It’s certainly surprising considering the film’s mixed reception, but nevertheless, it clearly has its fans. The film, released in 2021, is trending on Netflix and it’s one of the latest installments [...]

title: Disney Live-Action Movie Remake Likely Cancelled
description:
Disney has been gradually adapting a large number of animated classics from their library to live-action. For one animated Disney classic, however, it looks like its live-action remake is most likely cancelled. This is a potential result of the film losing its director.
